OOC: Apologies... I remember reading your post and I thought it had said she 
flew on to base that's why I haven't responded... (Thanks Airly)

::Hevn::
       He continues circling high above the mountain aware that Battera was 
approaching but hoping she would go away if he ignored her.  He finally 
realized that it wasn't going to happen and gave up.  He turns to face 
Battera and Transforms to his robot mode in the hopes that she'll remember 
him.  "Hello Battera.  Nice to see you again."  He lowers his voice to a 
whisper as a memory clicks in the back of his mind.  "Maximal."

--part1_179.1a2f664f.2bf18f3a_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
